name: and spend
description:
This is 'and spend', a new video game from Outhouse Media. The game is a mix of exploration and fighting mechanics. It's great for players who are just getting into the rhythm of playing games or who have been playing games for a while and want to get up to speed. It's compatible with iOS, Android, and PC.
A quick glance of the app tells you it's a bit of a take on the classic Final Fantasy games, with combat involving magic and upgrading your magic attacks. You'll also be able to take on various missions. If there's one thing I liked about Final Fantasy I doubt any game can be, it's that handling the game is such a joy. Final Fantasy is a game that's very easy for kids and young adults to pick up and quickly become addicted to. The fight system is the biggest change compared to previous games. Your character is equipped with the ability to raise, lower, max out, and customize their gear. This system is also where you'll be able to customize your character's stats like attack and defense, which will help you in the older Final Fantasy games. The game also has a speciality called Fira (Fist-style) that increases the damage and ability of your skills. The fist style is used with two hands (one in each hand) and is really nice for fighting with multiple weapons.
